summary: The Spaceport Project Opportunities for Resilient Transportation Act (SPACEPORT Act) amends Chapter 511 of Title 51 of the United States Code, focusing on space transportation infrastructure modernization grants. It modifies grant authority, clarifies eligibility criteria, and mandates a report to Congress on space transportation demand, infrastructure, funding options, and international capabilities. The bill also authorizes appropriations for grants and includes technical amendments to the chapter heading and table of chapters.
